channel.title: Please help this is the 3rd time ive posted!
channel.description:
[s] how do i change what u get for your pvp points and how many points that item costs
i know how to change item PRICES in the shops but on this source its a fairy that you talk to she gives you options, this is what she says [code] case 1337: choice5("@or3@You currently have "+pkpoints+" PVPP.","I want to buy 1m! (52)","I want to have the right to hold the Godswords! (2500)","I want to have the right to hold dragon claws! (7000)","Next page."); break; case 1338: choice5("@or3@You currently have "+pkpoints+" PVPP.","I want to have the right to hold black claws!(coming soon) (4500)","I want to have the right to hold a leaf-bladed spear! (6000)","I want to have the right to hold a cutlass! (39500)","I want to buy bandos. (20000)"); break;[/code]
i have changed the things in the () but that did not work i have searched through the whole client.java npchandler.java, item.java all of them any help?
[s][/s]

item.title: Please help this is the 3rd time ive posted!
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

It’s in your client class. Common sense will help. (pkpoints -= …)

Read full topic

how do i change what u get for your pvp points and how many points that item costs

i know how to change item PRICES in the shops but on this source its a fairy that you talk to she gives you options, this is what she says

case 1337: choice5("@or3@You currently have "+pkpoints+" PVPP.","I want to buy 1m! (52)","I want to have the right to hold the Godswords! (2500)","I want to have the right to hold dragon claws! (7000)","Next page."); break; case 1338: choice5("@or3@You currently have "+pkpoints+" PVPP.","I want to have the right to hold black claws!(coming soon) (4500)","I want to have the right to hold a leaf-bladed spear! (6000)","I want to have the right to hold a cutlass! (39500)","I want to buy bandos. (20000)"); break;

i have changed the things in the () but that did not work i have searched through the whole client.java npchandler.java, item.java all of them any help?
